course.title: Enterprise Systems Computing: COBOL I
course.catalogDescription: This course explores the structure of the COBOL programming language, to include basic syntax, flow control, record and memory structures, input/output and report writing. A real-world enterprise system environment will be used to provide exposure to JCL and various tools that support business processes and information flow.

objectives.objective: To learn elementary COBOL syntax for simple business applications.
To learn structured programming concepts and style recommendations.
To learn principles of business report design.
